title: AIML - Senior Machine Learning Engineer/Scientist, Siri and Information Intelligence
summary: The AIML Information Intelligence team at Apple is creating groundbreaking technology for artificial intelligence, machine learning, and natural language processing to redefine how people use their devices to search and find information.
description: As a member of the team, you will work on large scale machine learning and deep learning projects to improve Query Understanding and Ranking of search, develop generative AI technologies, and collaborate with researchers to develop Large Language Models for Apple’s AI products.
key_qualifications: Experience in machine learning, deep learning, information retrieval, knowledge graphs, natural language processing, or data mining. Proficiency in one of the following languages: Python, Go, Java, C++. Excellent knowledge and practical skills in major machine learning algorithms.
preferred_qualifications: MS or PhD in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, Information Retrieval, Data Science, or related field.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200. Apple also offers benefits such as medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and services, tuition reimbursement, and stock options.
